#summary How to compile the TibiaAPI from the latest repository source code
#labels Featured,Phase-Implementation
 # Checkout the latest version of the code (see [SVNSetup])
 # Open the project file tibiaapi/TibiaAPI.csproj in Visual Studio 2008 or later
 # Build the project by clicking Build > Build Solution
 # You need to build in Release mode first, so the injected dll can be added as a resource for TibiaAPI
 # The DLL can be found at tibiaapi/bin/Release/TibiaAPI.dll
